name: Overworked (GrowParishMeridian)
description:
Overlook

First year project for IIM (2020-2021), the work of my first weeks on the Unity engine.

Overworked is a short game where you control a man exploring his own dreams after weeks of crunch and hard work on his experiments on colors and emotions. 

Overgameplay

You can switch between two emotions, anger and sadness, red and blue. Your emotions protect you, you can't kill your enemies but you can protect yourself from them and other dangers if you have the same color! You can even activate switches with the corresponding colors!

Rare pills will slow or accelerate time, and two endings are available depending on you find the hidden collectible.

Overcontrols

Q & D to move left and right (sorry QWERTY users)
Z to jump

Left click to switch between anger and sadness.

Escape to pause

Overteam

Me

That's it!
